articles.title: Corals and cable cars: Vietnam tourist island Phu Quoc reopens with big dreams - CNA
articles.description: PHU QUOC, Vietnam: Tour guide Lai Chi Phuc has been counting down the days until travellers return to the white-sand beaches and thick tropical jungle of Vietnam's Phu Quoc, a once-poor fishing island pushing to be Asia's next holiday hotspot as COVID-19 pand…
articles.content: Ahead of Saturday's reopening, staff at Vinpearl resort - where the arrivals are staying - swept beaches, arranged cutlery on tables and laid out sunbeds. Others busied themselves painting delicate f… [+1942 chars]

articles.title: Checkup finds Biden fit for duty; Kamala Harris briefly in power - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Kamala Harris, the first woman, first Black person and first person of South Asian descent to be vice president, was — for one hour and 25 minutes — acting president while Biden was under anesthesia. | World News
articles.content: President Joe Biden remains healthy and vigorous and fit for duty, but is showing some signs of aging, his doctor said Friday after the oldest president in American history underwent his first routin… [+6894 chars]

articles.title: Six airlines to operate VTL services between S'pore and KL from Nov 29 - The Straits Times
articles.description: AirAsia, Jetstar Asia, Malaysia Airlines, Malindo Air, Scoot and Singapore Airlines will operate these services.. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE - Travellers will be able to choose from six designated services in each direction when the Malaysia-Singapore quarantine-free air travel scheme kicks off on Nov 29.
